verses.verse: <S%H3045>Know<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> he is <S%H430>God.<s%> It is he who has <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5971>us,<s%> and we are his. We are his people, and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of his <S%H4830>pasture.<s%>

<S%H935>Enter<s%> into his <S%H8179>gates<s%> with <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> into his <S%H2691>courts<s%> with <S%H8416>praise.<s%> Give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H1288>him,<s%> and bless his <S%H8034>name.<s%>
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H2896>good.<s%> His loving <S%H2896>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever,<s%> his <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
